div.p:
Burgenses et fratres gilde tempore prepositure Dauid Menyeis Anno Domini et cetera
octuagesimo octauo

Eodem die Walterus Williamson in Kynnellour gracia Johannis buchane recipitur
in liberum burgensem

Dauid steuarte recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde quia sponsauit filiam
burgensis solutis quinque solidis in alba bursa et prestito solito Juramento

Johannes fraser racione paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Solut' quinque s' in
alba bursa prestito Solito Juramento

Andreas peterkin in methtlik recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ad instanciam
Comitis de erole prestito Solito Juramento

Dauid Duffous' recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ad instanciam abbatis
de Deir et soluit xx s' prestito solito Juramento

Johannes Gray recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde solut' xx s' et
prestito solito Juramento

Johannes gilrutht recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento et solut'
quinque s'

Willelmus nory recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento
et solut' quinque s'

Philippus clerk recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento et solut'
x s'
Robertus de camera recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento racione paternitatis

Georgius byssat recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ad instanciam Jacobi leslie
Alexandri menyeis alexandri rede Johannis culane et diuersorum aliorum consilij prestito solito Juramento

Georgius eduardsone ad instanciam dominj de forbar recipitur in liberum burgensem et
fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento

Willelmus gray in grantuly recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde solut' xx s'
et prestito solito Juramento
Georgius pottar recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento et solut j merk

Willelmus gregory racione paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde solut' quinque s' et
prestito Solito Juramento
Duncanus spens recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento et solut' j merk
Willelmus allanson' in oudny recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Solut' xiij s' iiij d'

Johannes nicholson' in Inuerugy recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento et solut'
xiij s' iiij d'
Jonhannes Johannes thomson Junior recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento et solut' j merk
Thomas litileJonhne recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento et solut' xviij s'
Willelmus murray recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento et solut' xx s'

Philippus thomsone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde quia sponsauit filiam Willelmi
nicholsone burgensis solut' v s' in alba bursa et prestito Solito Juramento
Vmfray gray recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento et solut' xiij s' iiijor d'

Andreas Williamsone recipitur in liberum burgensem causa paupertatis propter deum prestito
solito Juramento

Henricus crage recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde quia
sponsauit filiam burgensem prestito Solito Juramento et solut' quinque s'

Thomas glenmanyn recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Jure paternitatis
prestito Solito Juramento et solut' quinque s' in alba bursa

Patricius baxtar filius quondam Nicholaij baxtar Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem
et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento et solut' quinque s' in alba bursa vt moris est

fraThis is a continuation of entry ARO-7-0106-05. Williame of gareache as he that come borghe to him for the saide Willia siluer
as day of peremptur but ony excepcione
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio Septimo die marcij Anno quo supra

The quhilk day it was statute and ordanit be the consale present for the tyme
that the ballieis sal cast cavillis for the four quartaris of the towne and fyne
Ilkan bailye sale gang throu the tone and charge ale the broustaris to brew tuelf
penny aile except' four broustaris in ilkan' quartar quhilk sale brew xvj penny aile
for the quhilkis the balyeis sale ansuer to the tone' ilkane in his avne quartar and
nay unfre folkis to brew vndir the pane of law

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' thome prat forspekar that Will moire
eldar sal content and pay to Jonhne portar ix s' and vi d' quhilk he tuk of formale
And' the ballieis chargit him to pay the samyn within terme of law

the samyn day Williame Kintor grantit him avand to Androu Wentone xi s' and
x d' for wyne the quhilk the ballieis chargit him to pay within terme of lav

the samyn day Williame of Kintor grantit him to releif ande fre Androu culane
the bailye of xxij s' aucht to Williame blinsele

The samyn day the balyeis assignit monunday cum xv dais to Richerd litstar to
ansuer tile ane borghe' strekit apone him be thome prat for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of xiij pundis vsuale money of Scotlande

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' thome prat forspekar that alexander traile
rolland is avand' to Jonhne Waus xij s' and vi d' for cardis the quhilk the balyeis
chargit him to pay within terme of law
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio ixo die marcij Anno quo supra

Eodem die actio detabilis debatabilis inter dominum Johannem ruthirfurd et dominum matheum nicholson
capellanum continuatur in hodie ad quindenam sub spe concordie

Dauid menyeis and Andreas Wentone fatebatur se ad subeundum Juri coram
suis preposito et balliuis in omnibus clameis inter ipsos debatabilibus ex parte
elene mvresone sponse sue

the samyn day the ballieis chargit Androu Wentone to pay to elene moreson
the assedate of Dauid menyeis ane kirtile of rede menys within terme of law and
alsua thai chargit Jonhne Wormet to fre the saide Androu of the said kirtile
withtin terme of law eftir the tenor of the akis maid obefor

the samyn day the ballieis with avys' of the court assignit this day fiftene
dais to Androu Wentone to preif that the tene markis folouit be Dauid
menyeis one the behalf of elene mvreson his affedate of the martymes
terme last bigan be virteu of ane obligacion was assignit to him to the
frething' of him in parte of ane gretar some that he is borghe' for to Jonhne
Robertsone in tarvas' Ande falyeing tharof to pay the saide tene markis
the saide day

The samyn day thome gledstane grantit him avand to Williame gareache
yongar xxtj s' of Siluer and iij d' and promittit to pay him the tane half
be the next sonday And the tothir half be the pasche immediate thareftir
for borrougang' of ane callit crukschank
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio decimo die mensis marcij Anno quo supra

the samyne day Alexander Ranisone wes in ane amerciament of this Court be his
awyne tvnge grant for the wrangus' withthaldin of x s' of the kingis taxt
fra the balyeis sayande he wes nocht set bot half ane merke in the taxt buk
And' thai askit x s' at him And' to amende as law wile and to bofer' in forbeir'
In tyme to cum

The saide Alexander Ranisone the samyne day wes in amerciament of this
Court for the wrangwise Relacione and allegence makin apon' ser Jhone'
Stiruelinge clerk for the tyme allegeand' he wes taxt bot half a merke
and' writin x s' And' to amende as law will and to forbeir' In tyme tocum
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xvio die mensis marcij Anno quo supra

The quhilk day Alexander mar was callit to Ansuer tile ane borghe' strekit
apone him be Alexander chamer of murchile for the frething' of the maile of ane
half nethis fisching' of the mydchingile quhilk he occupeit and wrangis
that he dois it nocht and comperit nocht quharfor the ballieis chargit Sandy
allansone seriande to pas' to the said Alexanderis hous' and tak ane stres'
and warne him to this day xv dais to Ansuer to the said borghe as
the secunde day of proces'

The samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' James of leslie tailysmane
that the wyf of Alexander traile sale Jois' and breuk the butht that hir' fadir
occupeit for ale the termes contenit in the assedacione maid obefor to the saide
Ranald be Androw Andirsone

the samyne day the ballieis assignit to morne to Dauid mar' to ansuer perempturlie
tile Androu branche for xviii s' and vi d' for the rest of a govne and to bring his
previs thar and deliu vnderlie ane assis' as he wile tyne and wyne And the said
Androu branche tile ansuer to him in ale thingis that he has to say to him

The samyn day Jonhne blak come borghe and dettour to Androu murray yongar
for lij s' of Siluer for murthou glenmaluyn to be pait at the Witsonday next
to cum in pennis ande pennyworthtis

the samyn day Wat thomsone grantit him avand to Androw masone vi s' and
vi d' quhilk the saide Androu assignit to sere Jonhne Stirueling' in part of pa
ment of ix s' aucht to him for ane yarde maile quhilk the ballieis chargit
him to pay within terme of law

Eodem die Joneta Abirdour fecit constituit et creauit Richardum Culan suam sponsam
suum verum legittimum procuratorem ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum a Willelmo Abirdour
suo patre suas litteras testimoniales coniuncte infeodacionis cuiusdam terre Jacentis infra
dictum burgum et inde quieteclamandum detinentem prosequendum et calumpniandum coram
quocumque Judice competen' in vberiore forma procuratorij Promittens de Rato et grato

The samyn day Richerde of cullane grantit and oblist to him to sett ane sufficient
dettour to Williame abirdour or the schipis saile to pay him fiwe pundis
gretis within xv dais eftir the erast schip salande out of the port of abirdene
cumis within ony port of flandris And gif he falyeis to sett him ane dettour
to pay him thre lib' scottis for ilkan punde gret of the schip saile

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' that Alexander Angusone yongar sal pay
to mavnis Wormet xx s' for the haile schipe
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xixo die marcij Anno quo supra

the samyn
day Dauid menyeis eldar fand ane borghe in the handis of thome Jameson
seriande that Jonhne Robertson Androw gray and Jhone Wawan producit thar be Androu
Wentone sulde nor aucht nocht to be witnes in the actione debatabile betuix
ellene his spous' ande the saide Androw for resonabile caus' that he suld allege
protestand thar' deposiciomedeposicione turne him to nay preiudice

Eodem die Johannes mar frater germanus alexander mar' revocavit quasdam litteras
procuratorias et assignacionis ac omnes alias litteras et euidencias alias Dauid
mar' per eum factas et easdem annullavit et cassauit Imperpetuum
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio vicesimo die marcij Anno quosupra

Eodem die Johannes lilburne fecit constituit et creauit Alexandrum angussone
seniorem suum verum legittimum procuratorem ad petendum ac recipiendum a Willelmo gareache
seniore xxv pelles et inde quieteclamandum Et si necesse fuerit eundem Willelmum prose
quendum et calumpniandum in vberiore forma procuratorij Promittens de rato et grato

Eodem die Andreas Wentone fecit constituit creauit et nominauit thomam fif suum
verum legittimum et indubitatum procuratorem ad defendendum et respondendum agendum prosequendumque
in actionibus debatabilibus inter ipsum ex vna et Dauid menyeis seniorem et suam
sponsam partibus ex altera ac in omnibus aliis actionibus et causis ipsum concernentibus
in vberiore forma procuratorij Promittens de Rato et grato

the samyn day Alexander prat entirit Alexander angussone yongar befor the ballieis
becaus' he was borghe to entir him the said day befor thaim to Ansuer
tile Androu muresone

The samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' thomas fyf forspekar
that Dauid mar is avande xviii s' and vi d' quhilk the balyeis chargit him
to pay within terme of law to Androu branche
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxjo die marcij Anno quo supra

quo die Alexander angousone Junior fecit constituit creauit et nominavit thomam
prat et Alexandrum angusone coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos procuratores ad
petendum exigendum et recipiendum naulum sibi debitum et de Receptis acquitandis
ac in omnibus aliis actionibus et querelis ipsum concernentibus detinen' prosequend'
et cetera Promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij

Eodem die Alexander Kennarti fecit et creauit Alexandrum anguson et suum procuratorem ad pe
tendum et recipiendum a Willelmo blinsele xiij s' et vij d' et ab omnibus aliis
sibi deben' et Inde acquitand' Prosequend' et defendend' Promittens
de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij et cetera

Eodem die seriandus de mandato balliuorum precepit alexandro sanchar
per virgam suam ad remanendum infra pretorium donec taxtam suam
persolueret

The samyne day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane suorne assis' be the
alexander rede tailisman of the samyn that Richerd litstar is quyt
of the challance of thome prat anent alevin pundis clamit be
him of the rest of ane pipe of wade and the saide thomas was in Amerciament
of the courte for the wranguis' borghe' strekin apone the saide Richerd
for the haldin of the saide some

Eodem die actio debatabilis inter Dauid menyeis seniorem et suam affedatam
elenam muresone ex vna et Andream Wentone partibus ex altera cum consensu
parcium continuatur vsque ad diem lune proximo futuro in modo forma et effectu prout pro
instante ste absque preiudicio parcium

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xxviij die mensis marcij et cetera lxxxixo
Anno quosupra

The samyn day Alexander mar' tuk to preif the borghe' strekit
apone him be alexander chamer of murchile anent the frethin of the said Alexander chamer
of the maile of ane half nethis fischingis of the mydchingile of ane yer endit
and askit ane lauchfule day to present his preif And thareftir the aldirman and balyeis
assignit this day xv dais to the said Alexander mar to preif this matir endit

The samyne day it was fundin ande deliuerit be ane suorne assis' be the
moutht of Alexander rede tailsman of the samyn that Williame ramsay
is quyt of xiij bollis ande ane firlot of beire clamit be alexander
of mar

the samyne day the aldirman and ballieis assignit fiwe markis of Dauid
mathesonis' watter maile of the pott of this instant yer to be pait to mastir
Jonhne gray the mastir masone

The samyne day the aldirman ande ballieis with avys' of the courte
assignit this day xv dais to Walter auchneyf Robert crage Jonhne
grige Williame futhes ande Robert of buchan to Ansuer tile ane borghe
strekit one thame be Jonhne Waus ande certane of his nichtbouris for the wrang
uys' taxing' of the sa thame hear thane thar gudis extendis to as day
of peremptour

The said day it was fundin ande deliuerit be warde of the court and gevin
for dome that Androu Wentone sale content ande pay to Dauid menyes
and ellene muresone his affedate tene markis vsuale money of Scotland
in part of pament of ane obligacion of the martimes terme bigan becaus' the
said Androw tuk to preif the said tene markis assignit to him And falye
in the samyn eftir the tenor' of the akis gane obefor

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio tercio die Aprilis Anno Domini
Millesimo quadringentesimo octuagesimo Nono

The samyn day perhandboll zeland' fand murthou glenmaluyn souerte to do
to Niniane ros' ande his procuratouris that he aw to do of law anent
tene dakir of gaitskinnis resauit of the saide Ninianis

The samyn day the aldirman balyeis ane part of the consale and communite
grantit to philp Dunbrek fiwe markis vsual money of Scotland
of the erest common' gudis that cane be gottin for his gud seruice to be done to
thame And specialie in the execucion of his office to the aldirman and consale
for this yere for thai chesit him officiar to the aldirman and the Consale

the samyn day Jonhne moire come souerte to Jonhne portar for ix s' and vi d'
of Siluer for Williame moir eldar optenit be ane ak obefor to pay
him or mak him be pait be Witsonday next to cum And the said
William oblist him to freith' the saide Jonhne moire of the said siluer

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio Sexto die Aprilis Anno Domini et cetera
octuagesimo nono

the samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane suorne assis' be the moutht
of thomas prat that perhandboll has done that he aw to do tile Androu
Waus anent his bile of rekning deliuerit him and the said Androw sale pay
him his fraucht and vncostis that he aw him for his gudis

The said day it was appontit and accordit betuix Jonhne Waus brothir
to the lard of many and procurator tile Jonhne Waus gilbertis sone one
that ane part Ande Jonhne fechat one that vthir parte anent the clame
of half ane nethis fischingis of the raik debatabile betuix thame
one this wys' that is to say the saide Jonhne Waus sal pay to the
said Jonhne fechat half ane barrele of Salmond at the next myd
summir for the quhilkis he fand Robert blinsele dettour and the said Jhon'
fechat quyt of ale Richt of the said fischingis for tua yeris to cum and
Jonhne Waus quyt of his clame of the samyn fischingis for the said termes

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio octauo die mensis Aprilis
Anno Domini et cetera octuagesimo nono

the quhilk day Williame philp grantit him borghe' to Jonhne
of Knollis for iiijor merkis for ane pardoner quhilkis the ballieis
chargit him to pay within terme of law

Eodem die thomas cuming de kindrocht non vi aut metu ductus nec errore
lapsus seu aliquo dolo Circumuentus sed sua pura et spontanea voluntate
annuo non variand' vt apperuit totas et integras terras suas dimidietatis
de Karnes et armabethis cum suis pertinencijs Jacentas in domino de lummey
infra vicecomitem de Abirdene per fustem et baculum in manibus honorabilis viri
Alexandri Iruyn de lummey dominj superioris earundem sursum reddidit purem
simpliciter resignauit Renunciando omni Juri et Juris clameo dictarum
terrarum pro se heredibus suis et suis assignatis Imperpetuum Ita quod liceat
dicto domino superiori de eisdem pro sue libito voluntatis disponere et easdem
sibimet ipsi retinere quia huiusmodi terras Impigneratas Willelmus cuming quondam
pater suus presens habuerat in quibus ipse thomas sasitus fuerat et summam siue
peccuniam sibj super eidem debit' reciperiat recipierat Teste Curia

The samyn day Williame moire eldar was conuikit be ane assis' of thir personis
vndir writin that is to say Alexander chamer of murchile thomas prat Jonhne
of Knollis Jonhne Wormet Alexander chamer yongar Dauid mathesone Androw
murray yongar William blinsel William gareache eldar William futhes
William tulidef Androu Wentone Androu murray eldar Jonhne Waus
and henry hourum deliuerit be the moutht of the said Alexander chamer of murchil
that the said William was in Amerciament of the Court for the wranguis' strubulance
of phil Dunbrek officiar in the execucion of his office and to Amend' to
him as law and forber in tyme to Cum

the said day it was fundin be the said assis' that philp Dunbrek was
quyt of al strubulance of the said Williame moire

The said day it was fundin and deliuerit be the said assis' Alexander chamer
of murchile tailsman that Williame moire eldar was conuict' for the disobeing'
of the aldirman Dauid menyeis and thome of mar' bailye in the exe
cucion' of thar office for the quhilk the said William was in Amerciament
of the court and to amend as law wile and forber' in tyme to cum And
the saidis aldirman and bailye was fundin quyt of al strubulance of the
said Williame

Eodem die patricius Andirsone conuictus per assisam pro perturbio Johannis Kintor
et ad emendandum sibi ut Jura voluit et Idem Johannes in Amerciamento Curie pro inordinata
namacione prefati patricij

Eodem die Johannes Kintor gilberti inuenit Alexandrum chamer de murchile
plegium legalem quod patricius andirsone erit Indempnis pro eo aliter
quam per viam Juris Et dictus patricius inuenit Andream lammyntone
quod dictus Johannes erit Indempnis pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris
et quilibet ipsorum obligatur per manum ad conseruandum plegio suum Indempnem
de huiusmodi fideiussione

The samyn day yane persone procurator to Cornelis henrison of the
feire follouit Jonhne chapman for Sex barrellis of Salmond be
ane obligacion vndir the saide Jonhneis merk quhilkis obligacion
the said Jonhne denyit in plane Court and in continent the said actione
was put tile ane assis' suorne tharto quhilkis riplie avisit deliuerit
ande fand' be the moutht of Williame blinsele tailysman of the
samyn continevit the saide action' to the hame cuming' of Jonhe
of gilespy ane of the witnes contenit in the said obligacione
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio ixo die aprilis Anno quo supra

Eodem die Alexander chamer filius thome chamer de bundis conuictus
per assisam pro perturbio Andree murray senioris et ad
emendandum sibi ut Jura volunt et dictus Andreas conuictus de omni
perturbio ipsius Alexandri quare precipitur eidem alexandro ad petendum
veniam a preposito nomine tocius burgi pro huiusmodi perturbio facto
infra burgum et si in postrum aliquod perturbium in eodem perpatrauerit
soluet ad edificacionem chori denoti patronj nostri beati Nicholaij de
abirdene quinque li' monete vsualis Scocie sine remissione

Eodem die Alexander chamer filius thome chamer de bundis inuenit Alexandrum
chamer de murchile plegium legalem quod Andreas murray senior
et pars sua erunt Indempnes pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris
et dictus andreas inuenit thomas prat plegium legalem quod dictus alexander
et pars sua erunt Indempnes pro eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris
et quilibet ipsarum parcium obligatur per manum ad conseruandum plegium
suum Indempnem de huiusmodi fideiussione

In the bailye Court haldin the xiii day of Aprile the yer
forsaide The samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be warde
of the court And gevin for dome that Alexander of mar sal pay to
Alexander chamer of murchile the maile of ane half nethis fisching' of
the mydchingile becaus' the said alexander mar tuk to preif the saide
matir endit the said day and falyet in his preif the quhilkis the balyeis
chargit him to par within terme of law

the samyn day comperit Alexander mar and askit at mastir Androu Cadiow
to releyf him of the maile of ane helf nethis fischingis of the mydchingile
quhilkis the said mastir Androu opinly denyit to freithe him tharanent
offering him redy to vndirly the decision' of ane assis' protestand gif euir
that the saide Alexander mar follouis him befor ony vthir Juge that he be
nocht herd quhile he gate his costis and expensis

Eodem die actio debatabili inter Rectorem de vna et Jacobum Innes
in artibus magistrum cum consensu parcium continuatur vsque ad Curiam capitalem
proximam post pascha in similibus forma et effectu

the samyn day Jonhne Waus comperit offering' redy to follou his borghe
apone the taxtaris and consentit to nay continuacion becaus' the said day
was assignit to him as day of peremptour protestand for the remed of
law

the samyn day comperit Williame abirdour and offerit him redy to
tak and resaue souerte and dettour fra Richerd of Cullane for fiwe
li' g' and gat nane protestand that he may haue iij l' Scottis
for Ilkane punde gret eftir the tenor of the akis maid obefore

the said day the officiar at commavnd of the balyeis chargit Androw
Wentone to remane within the tolbutht quhile he pait x merkis to
Dauid menyes and his spous'

the xv day of aprile the yer forsaid Richerd of Cullane fand henry
hourvm dettour to Williame abirdour and the samyn henry become
ful dettour to the said William for the pament of fiwe lib' gretis eftir
the tenor' of the ak maid obefor And the said Richerd oblist him
his landis and gudis one this syde the sey and beyond to freithe and
releif the said henry and to keip him skathles of the said fiwe li' g'
